faq.title: Frequently Asked
faq.description: Answers to common questions about Samsung refrigerators

q1.question: How does Inverter technology work on Samsung refrigerators?
q1.answer: Digital Inverter technology helps flexibly adjust compressor speed according to cooling needs, saving up to 50% electricity, reducing noise, and extending compressor lifespan up to 21 years.

q2.question: Do Samsung refrigerators have SmartThings connectivity?
q2.answer: High-end refrigerator lines integrate SmartThings, allowing remote control via smartphone, notifications when the door is left open, and food status monitoring.

q3.question: What is Samsung's warranty policy?
q3.answer: Samsung refrigerators are covered by a 2-year full warranty, 10 years for Inverter compressor. Official warranty at over 1000+ service centers nationwide.

q4.question: Are Samsung refrigerators energy-efficient?
q4.answer: With Digital Inverter technology and energy-saving certification, Samsung refrigerators only consume 0.6-1.2 kWh/day, saving up to 50% compared to regular refrigerators.

q5.question: How to choose the right refrigerator capacity?
q5.answer: Family of 2-3: 150-250L | Family of 4-5: 300-400L | Family of 6+ or high freezing needs: 500L+. Choose a capacity 20% larger than current needs.

q6.question: What is Twin Cooling Plus technology?
q6.answer: Twin Cooling Plus uses 2 separate cooling systems for refrigerator and freezer compartments, maintaining optimal 70% humidity, preventing odor mixing, keeping food fresh twice as long.

q7.question: What is PolarLux's installment policy?
q7.answer: PolarLux supports 0% interest installment for all genuine Samsung refrigerators. Applicable with credit cards from over 20 banks (Vietcombank, Techcombank, VPBank, etc.). Flexible terms: 3 ‚Äì 6 ‚Äì 12 months. No hidden fees, no collateral required. Additionally, PolarLux has installment programs through financial partners for customers without credit cards ‚Äì only requiring ID card and income statement.

q8.question: What is PolarLux's after-sales service like?
q8.answer: PolarLux is committed to providing superior after-sales service compared to the market: Genuine nationwide warranty according to Samsung standards (24 months), plus 6 months extended warranty for customers who register online. Exchange for new within 15 days if technical defects are detected, 1-for-1 exchange within 30 days for products in the "Genuine Peace of Mind" program. Technical support and usage consultation 24/7, free for the product's lifetime.

q9.question: How to purchase at PolarLux
q9.answer: You can order genuine Samsung refrigerators from PolarLux in 2 ways: (1) Online shopping at mu-fridge.com website - Access website, select product, view detailed information, add to cart, fill in delivery information, choose payment method (online/COD/0% installment), confirm order. After confirmation, PolarLux will contact to confirm delivery schedule and provide free home installation support. (2) Order via Hotline 1900.xxx.xxx - Our consulting team will answer details about products, prices and current promotions, guide you to choose suitable models and support direct phone orders.

q10.question: Does PolarLux have physical stores?
q10.answer: Currently, PolarLux operates on an online-first distribution model to offer prices 5‚Äì15% more competitive than traditional retail systems. Therefore, PolarLux does not open mass retail store chains, helping optimize operating costs and transfer all benefits in terms of prices and offers to customers.
